    class 
    ChildBounds<C,T>
    This class is a LazyObjectBounds specialised for the children of a TimeLayout.
    class 
    LazyObjectBounds<O>
    This class allows lazy computation of ObjectBounds.
    class 
    ObjectBounds<O>
    The mutable bounds associated to an object that needs to be visualised in a TimeLayout (and the TimeLayout will be responsible for the computation of its bounds).
